subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: With his team trailing the Royals in the World Series, David Wright rose to meet the moment: He lined a two-run homer over the left-field fence, something indelible and clutch.
snippet: With his team trailing the Royals in the World Series, David Wright rose to meet the moment: He lined a two-run homer over the left-field fence, something indelible and clutch.
